caption.title: Example of typical summertime sea-surface temperature in south-eastern South Australia.
caption.p: The image shows the 25 year climatological condition for February from the Sea-surface Temperature Atlas of Australian Regional Seas (SSTAARS) provided by the Bureau of Meteorology and available through the Integrated Marine Observing System Ocean Current website ( oceancurrent.imos.org.au/product). Areas of dark blue (<16Â°C) indicate cold water upwelling events.
